sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 7, 2026 –

Bucks Run is groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.
Will be open February 7th & February 8th. Trails are groomed.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: 29° and 10mph at 12:45pm. I classic skied with fresh Swix purple grip. Fast, flat, clean tracks were awesome at the start. I felt Olympian flying down the straightaways, my speed increasing as the temp climbed to 31° and the tracks acquired a subtle glaze. As the trail received more traffic, the curves lost their tracks and steep sides became shallow.  Wind increased substantially over 2.5 hrs, but Buck’s was protected, and only when I skied back to the shop, did my speed slow significantly.I had not been to HM in 3 years and yesterday explored Maltby Vista, Cedar trace and Coyote run, which were not recently groomed and frustrating due to stretches of grass in the track or tracks completely gone. With a couple inches of snow and a fresh groom, many more km should be good to go.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Mother Nature’s snow - Nubs groom : it doesn’t any better - LF 7 works .Understand there is a 28 inch hard pack base beneath that groom !  See you in April at Nub’s .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Friday. . Conditions are exceptionally good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It's a brisk and beautiful start to the ski day with some snow in the air. Despite the cold air temperature the wind is very light and it feels much warmer than the thermometer would suggest. The snow is machine groomed and continues to be in exceptional condition for skiing and riding. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is andouille and vegetable. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
